item.title: Israeli forces open near aid site, killing 3, Gaza health officials say
item.description: Israeli forces in the Gaza Strip opened fire as people headed toward an aid distribution site, health officials and a witness said.

item.title: China says U.S. violating tariffs truce with moves on AI chips and student visas
item.description: China has blasted the U.S. for issuing AI chip export control guidelines, stopping the sale of chip design software to China, and planning to revoke C...

item.title: Putin ‘is preparing for more war,’ GOP senator warns after meeting with Zelenskyy and Macron
item.description: Two U.S. senators are warning that Russian President Vladimir Putin is stalling on peace while preparing a fresh military offensive against Ukraine.

item.title: Supreme Court declines to hear challenge to Maryland assault weapons ban
item.description: The Maryland law was passed after the 2012 shooting at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Connecticut that killed 20 children and six adults.
